channel.title: PAX, have you gone?
channel.description: I'm pretty pumped, I just got PAX prime tickets for this year. Has anyone gone to a PAX event before (prime/east/south/australia)? If so how was it?

item.title: PAX, have you gone?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Niiiiiiiice.

The only reason I even know of the series is because Super Smash Bros Melee has been one of their biggest games at the last few PAX events.

Are you competing in any events?

Read full topic

item.title: PAX, have you gone?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:3, topic:555578”]Is is not really my thing and I don’t think we have them in New Zealand. But I’ll be going to my first Mardi Gras this month[/quote]Yeah, they dont have them in NZ. There is one in Australia. The main two are PAX East (Boston) and West (aka Prima, Seattle). The other three are Aus, South (Texas), and Dev (Developers conference). Have a fun Mardi Gras!

[quote=“sini, post:2, topic:555578”]I want to. But it’s pretty pricey considering I could take a vacation somewhere else and arguably have more fun. The only reason I’d go is to meet up with some of my streamer friends who usually go to network.[/quote]I agree, if I didn’t live 30 minutes away I wouldnt fork out the 200 a night for the hotel, plus air fair, plus the badges, plus food, etc etc etc.

Read full topic

item.title: PAX, have you gone?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Is is not really my thing and I don’t think we have them in New Zealand. But I’ll be going to my first Mardi Gras this month

item.title: PAX, have you gone?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

I want to. But it’s pretty pricey considering I could take a vacation somewhere else and arguably have more fun. The only reason I’d go is to meet up with some of my streamer friends who usually go to network.

Read full topic
